Fluids (which includes liquids and gases) are made up of particles which can be atoms or molecules. Play with a web interactive to see how interacting particles become a fluid

## Links to Activity

* [Link to the pipe interactive](http://go.osu.edu/pipe)
* [Link to the fluid with gravity interactive](http://go.osu.edu/fluidgrav)
